entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 this morning then southwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023
